ratings.comment: Prof. Feinstein is a great professor and a great guy. He cares a lot about the subject, and effectively helps students to learn and collaborate with each other. Your writing and critical thinking will improve under his teaching, without being overly stressed about anything. A+

His students understanding and interacting with the material is Noahs first goal. He is generous, engaging, and very smart. His class is not hard to get a good grade in, but you want to do extra work because it is so interesting!
